Title: Ek Din Achanak
Actors: Shabana Azmi, Shreeram Lagoo, Aparna Sen, Uttara Baokar
Plot: One day a retired professor (Dr. Sreeram Lagoo) decides to go out for unknown work but don't come back, even there is no clue left behind. Family members, relatives and friends try hard but unable to come up with any satisfactory result.
Production: National Film Development Corporation of India
